comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by esyr.

This update has obsoleted [microcode_ctl-2.1-50.fc36](https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2022-c781f5af83), and has inherited its bugs and notes.

This update can be pushed to stable now if the maintainer wishes
